title: cmd/gc: revision a336611cbced includes internal state in error output
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Compile the code at http://play.golang.org/p/J4av0P_SGw

What is the expected output?
Errors without internal bits of information

What do you see instead?
Apparently internal data such as `@"".foo.meh`

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version devel +981ed43b6f82 Mon Feb 11 11:56:49 2013 +1100 linux/amd64

Please provide any additional information below.
issue #4510 introduces revision a336611cbced which adds the value of s->def to the
output. I'm not sure s->def contains any information that is valuable to the person
reading the error output.
